reviews.name: Andy A.
reviews.title: Love my laptop bag!
reviews.description: I've been rocking my Pokemon laptop bag for almost two years now and it's still in great shape, plus it's the most stylish bag on the block. I ordered three more bags for friends and family and they all came out nicely as well. Love the customization and uniqueness of each!

reviews.name: Josh V.
reviews.title: My first custom designed piece
reviews.description: I am a software engineer and I need something to help protect my laptop in transit while also looking good. I got everything I asked for from the messenger bag that SA Taylor made for me. I am happy with the craftsmanship and the materials used. I found it to be correctly sized and highly utilitarian, while also looking good. I have received numerous compliments on the bag. I'm really happy that this is my first designer custom piece; it's a great start.
